name: OFX Plugins
body:
## Download
[Download the plugins](https://github.com/nicholascarroll/openfx-misc/releases)

### ChannelMath
ChannelMath is an artist-friendly channel math expression node. It is designed to be simple and easy to use rather than richly featured.
### INK Keyer
INK is a general purpose keyer that is suitable for both novice and expert compositors. For the novice, the user interface is simple and self explanatory. For the expert, the user interface provides conveniences to make it fast to construct modular node trees.

INK is a classic proportionate colour difference keyer.

## Authors and Contributors
ChannelMath and INK are written by Nicholas Carroll (@nicholascarroll).

If you can code C++ or are learning then why not contribute?

## Support or Contact
nicholas underscore carroll at icloud dot com.
